summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GreenAI application frontend and backend. Frontend is working excellently with premium aurora theme, all navigation, and core functionality. Backend has routing configuration issue for health endpoints.

critical_bugs.issue: Health endpoints return 404 when accessed via external URL - routing configuration issue
critical_bugs.impact: Health checks fail from external monitoring, but backend is running internally

configuration_issues.issue: External ingress not configured to route health endpoints to backend
configuration_issues.symptoms: Health endpoints return Next.js 404 page instead of FastAPI response
configuration_issues.workaround: Backend is accessible internally and API endpoints work with /api prefix

design_issues.issue: Premium backdrop blur effects selector not found (minor - visual effects may still be present)

passed_tests: Login page loads with premium aurora theme
Signup page loads with premium aurora theme
Dashboard page loads and shows sidebar navigation
All navigation links present (Dashboard, Projects, Job Runs, API Keys, Reports, Compare, Settings)
All pages load successfully (Projects, Job Runs, API Keys, Reports, Compare, Settings)
API endpoints properly secured (401 for unauthenticated requests)
Premium UI styling and animations present
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Kubernetes ingress configuration to route health endpoints (/healthz, /readyz) to FastAPI backend instead of Next.js frontend. Backend is running correctly internally but external routing needs adjustment.
